column4: Anyone uses " Audacious " player? I tagged an option that won't show me the player. lol
How can I restore it?
How can I install tar.bz2 ?
How to install files that are .tar.bz2 please?
Driver.
My sound driver.
what sound card do you have?
as I said, on windows I was facing this problem, until I had to install the Driver - I tried through wine, it didn't work - how can I do install tar.bz2 ?
what exactly is it that you are trying to install?
and what sound card do you have?
installing the sound card driver - It's a built-in sound card, with built in speaker for HP Compaq DC5000
where did you get this driver from? what driver is it?
a tar.bz2 file is an archive format, like a zip file
what is the name of the file?
and what are the names of those files?
ubuntu 8.04 has alsa 1.0.16, they are just older versions of the same driver
i have no idea, maybe it's a mixer setting you need to adjust
you don't need to use sudo
you'll probably need to play around with the sound mixer to do what you want
it sounds like a very card specific problem
well it worked fine with Windows, when I installed the driver.
you already have a driver for your card
ubuntu has one installed by default
I see. got it
